Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 31st/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses temp. rerouted EB: 35th, Rhodes, 33rd, Cottage Grove, & 35th Term.; WB: Exit via 35th Term., due to street blockage near 31st/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 31st/Cottage Grove, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, Rhodes, 33rd, Cottage Grove, & into 35th Terminal.

Westbound buses will operate/Exit via 35th Terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Kimball
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Kimball due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Kimball due to track switching problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
